info.gridworld.world
Class World<T>

java.lang.Object
  info.gridworld.world.World<T>
Direct Known Subclasses:
SudokuWorld
public abstract class World<T>
extends java.lang.Object

A World is the mediator between a grid and the GridWorld GUI.
This class is not tested on the AP CS A and AB exams.
This class has been modified for the Sudoku game. It is now abstract and has three new abstract methods that are implemented in SudokuWorld. The new methods are newPuzzle, solve, and clear.

locationClicked

public boolean locationClicked(info.gridworld.grid.Location loc)
This method is called when the user clicks on a location in the WorldFrame.

Parameters:
loc - the grid location that the user selected
Returns:
true if the world consumes the click, or false if the GUI should invoke the Location->Edit menu action

keyPressed

public boolean keyPressed(java.lang.String description,
                          info.gridworld.grid.Location loc)
This method is called when a key was pressed. Override it if your world wants to consume some keys (e.g. "1"-"9" for Sudoku). Don't consume plain arrow keys, or the user loses the ability to move the selection square with the keyboard.

Parameters:
description - the string describing the key, in this format.
loc - the selected location in the grid at the time the key was pressed
Returns:
true if the world consumes the key press, false if the GUI should consume it.

a random empty location

Overrides:
toString in class java.lang.Object

newPuzzle

public abstract void newPuzzle(int difficulty,
                               int puzzleLoc)
Added for Sudoku game. Gets a new puzzle, creates a new game with it, displays the message to the player, and shows the grid.

Parameters:
difficulty - the difficulty of the game. Legal values are Puzzle.EASY, Puzzle.MEDIUM, Puzzle.HARD, and Puzzle.EVIL.
puzzleLoc - the location of the puzzle. Legal values are Puzzle.INTERNET and Puzzle.FILE.

solve

public abstract void solve()
Added for Sudoku game. Solves the same if a puzzle has been loaded; returns otherwise.

clear

public abstract void clear()
Added for Sudoku game. Clears the board if a puzzle has been loaded; returns otherwise.
